resources.string:
SuperCalc calculator supports three modes of operation: 
 - plain 
 - scientific 
 - programmer 
 

In scientific mode, calculation of direct and inverse trigonometric functions is available, logarithms (arbitrary and natural), square root and exponentiation operations are available. 
 In addition, you can use the following functions: 
 - deg - convert radians to degrees 
 - rad - convert degrees to radians 
 - min - min of arguments 
 - max - max of arguments 
 - avg - arithmetic mean of arguments 



 The "programmer" mode supports number comparison operations, logical operations (&, |, ~), work with different calculus systems (from 2 to 16)
